summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing the execution of an agreement with Water District No. 61, King County, providing for the acquisition by the City of the Water Distributing System of such District and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of the existing water system within such area; and declaring the estimated cost thereof to be financed by a monthly surcharge upon all customers within such area.
